titleStmt.title: A remembraunce of the wel imployed life, [and] godly end, of George Gaskoigne Esquire who deceassed at Stalmford in Lincolneshire the 7. of October. 1577. The reporte of Geor. Whetstons gent. an eye witnes of his godly and charitable end in this world.
titleStmt.author: Whetstone, George, 1544?-1587?

titleStmt.title: A remembraunce of the wel imployed life, [and] godly end, of George Gaskoigne Esquire who deceassed at Stalmford in Lincolneshire the 7. of October. 1577. The reporte of Geor. Whetstons gent. an eye witnes of his godly and charitable end in this world.
titleStmt.author: Whetstone, George, 1544?-1587?

publicationStmt.publisher: For Edward Aggas, dwelling in Paules Churchyard and are there to be solde,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The lyfe and death of George Gaskoigne.

Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
